content: **let the summer begin wrap yourself in the lightweight kiss of the montego shawl ** made from silky bamboo yarn this beginner-friendly triangle wrap features a mesh pattern using basic stitches and is finished with a sweet picot border make yours in one color mix things up with a gradient yarn cake or experiment with a new-to-you plant-based yarn the possibilities are endless *pattern includes tutorial video * **materials** -775 yards 4 skeins lion brand truboo sample made in coral substitute any comparable dk #3 weight yarn - plant fibers like bamboo linen or cotton are recommended -4mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry needle -one locking stitch marker -blocking supplies **techniques** -working turned row -double and treble_crochet -basic increasing -picot border **measurements** one size - 67 wingspan x 32 depth // buy more save more // use these codes to save when you buy multiple patterns - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns add all patterns to cart for discount limit one use per purchase
